trans-unit.source: References one or more methods to be called when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: 參考一個或多個網路的可用性變更時要呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: This delegate handles <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.NetworkAvailabilityChanged> events raised by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個委派會處理<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.NetworkAvailabilityChanged><xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange>類別</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange>所引發的事件</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.NetworkAvailabilityChanged>

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on receiving notification for network interface address change events, see the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange> class overview documentation.
trans-unit.target: 接收通知的網路介面位址的詳細資訊，請變更事件，請參閱<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange>類別概觀文件。</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.NetworkAvailabilityChanged> event is supported on Windows 2000 and later.
